title: Can you explain Billie Eilish to me? I am totally new to her music. What songs should I listen to? - Quora

response.answer_text: Billie Eilish has a wide range of different songs- from breezy songs about multiple homocides (bellyache) to how she feels being rejected by her crush (wish you were gay). She is also known for having a lot of ASMR in her songs, for example in the beginning of ‘You Should See Me in a Crown”, there is the sound of a knife being drawn from its sheath. Another thing to know is that not all of her songs are necessarily true-although she might just be like the normal teenager with mental health issues (depression), she and her brother Finneas O'Connell sometimes like to create characters for her songs. “Bellyache” is a good example of that. She never really killed all of her friends XD. Billie Eilish never actually intended to become famous. Her first song, which she wrote with her mum, “Ocean Eyes”, she uploaded to SoundCloud only intending for her dance teacher to hear it. But before she knew it, the song had gone viral and remixes were being made some time after that. Here are a few of my favourites which I really recommend from her albums (in no particular order): When I was Older (inspired by film ROMA)Wish You Were GayBury a FriendYou Should See Me In A CrownAll the good girls go to Hellughh there is so many I might as well have listed every single one of her songs XD Anyway, thanks for giving me the opportunity to answer a question about her, I have been bursting for ages!

Omggggg. Okay I'm not one for much of newer artists that everyone listens to, I could honestly care less cause it's just not my thing and I feel like a lot of newer artists just have lost the ability to make you feel something deeply but BILLIEEEEE. <3 She deserves so much love. She is a musical mastermind, for real. Shes only 17, and so creative, talented, and really has a set of pipes! You can really hear the emotion behind her voice too which I love when an artist really shows you how their feeling. She writes her own songs & not to mention her music videos are really outside of the box as well. Shes just great. You should listen to literally anything. Theres really only one song I didnt really care for and that's one of her more popular ones currently called “You should see me in a crown" i like the beat of it and all dont get me wrong, just didnt really care for the lyrics is all. But if I had to choose, some of my faves are “bellyache" “ocean eyes" “my boy" “when the partys over" “wish you were gay" “lovely" “bad guy" “bury a friend" “xanny" & “bitches broken hearts". You wont regret itttttt. (:

Well, I’m a semi-new fan as well, but I’ve known her long enough to have 80% of her songs memorized. So I feel I can answer your question. Bilie Eilish is really her own genre. I mean, she fits into pop but doesn’t make stereotypical pop music. She’s a very energetic teen with inspiration, and she’s real. By that I mean, she doesn’t have a “fake” personality in any situation. Yes she cusses. A lot actually, but not to be demeaning, in fact. Anyways, you said you wanted songs to listen to right? Hmmmmm. Honestly? All of them. Literally all of them are amazing. But to ease you in, here are five of my favorites: when the party’s overidontwannabeyouanymorebellyachei love youparty favorSo yeah, that’s billie eilish. I suggest you go onto her YouTube and watch some of her performances, they’re pretty great. Anyway, have a nice day!

Start with Ocean Eyes her earliest single. It’s also on a compilation called Don’t Smile at Me that has all her early singles. She had a handful of singles last year working up to her amazing new album. Just listen, you’ll get it. She’s young creative and original.

Ethan,I took a quick listen to some of the songs you have posted in your answers on quora. It seems you have a taste for quirky,depressing,moody songs. Billie Eilish should fit right up your street. She's the queen of misery. Which songs? Billie Eilish :Yes.

fun songs bellyache ** my boy ** bad guy my strange addiction wish you were gay* you should see me in a crown sad/chill idontwannabeyouanymore * when the party’s over ** listen before I go i love you goodbye * xanny* ocean eyes hostage come out and play bored ** watch other bury a friend *** when I was older ** party favor * all the good girls go to hell COPYCAT &burn ok I think that’s all of them ;)
